name: Cream of the Crop Soup
description:
This is a project for Curdle Jam #10. I have never worked in 3D before and also I am a beginner in blender but I had fun doing it and hope that you will enjoy it.

You have to prepare the "Cream of the Crop" soup for your family. A friend sent you a message with the ingredients, but your phone battery is almost done so you can see the message just for a few seconds before it disappears. It contains a list of vegetables for the soup and the order.

Potatoes and zucchini are the heavier ones, tomatoes, brown and white onions are in the the middle, carrots are the lighter ones.

Keys:

- Letters on the table to select the vegetable
- Up/down to select the strength to use to throw the vegetables to the pan
- Space to throw the vegetables
- Esc popup to ask to reset the game and go back to the starting screen

Thanks a lot to StudioSomeric, for the great introductory videos on how to do low poly vegetables in blender.
